page.title: 09HESKETH FLETCHER
page.content: {HESKETH FLETCHER}IS A MODERN COMPREHENSIVE SECONDARY SCHOOL. IT HAS ABOUT{900 PUPILS}BETWEEN THE AGES OF 11 TO 16. THE CLASSES CONSIST OF BOTH SEXES. THERE ARE AROUND{60 {TEACHERS. }THERE ARE ABOUT{60 ROOMS AND THESE INCLUDE{3 SCIENCE {LABORATORIES, 3 CRAFT ROOMS {(METALWORK ROOMS) AND 2 DOMESTIC {SCIENCE ROOMS. }IT HAS A SMALL GYMNASIUM, WHERE NETBALL, BASKETBALL TAKE PLACE. THERE IS A NEWLY BUILT EXTENSION TO THE SCHOOL WHICH CONTAINS THE ART SUITE AND DRAMA STUDIO. THERE ARE{LARGE PLAYING FIELDS}WHICH PROVIDE AMPLE PLAYING AREAS FOR SPORTS. THERE IS A SEPARATE BUILDING KNOWN AS{THE {UNIT. }HERE THERE ARE SPECIALLY LAID OUT ROOMS FOR{COMPUTERS AND {TYPEWRITERS. }(CONTINUED ON PAGE 10) {
